data.title: What are some of the best known films that Elizabeth Hurley has starred in?
data.meta_description:
Without a doubt one of the best known films that Elizabeth
Hurley has starred in would be 1997's "Austin Powers: International
Man of Mystery" starring opposite of Mike Myers. She would play the
same role in the second film, 1999's "Austin Powers: The Spy Who
Shagged Me". Another notable movie that she starred in would be
"Bedazzled" with Brendan Fraser as the male lead.
data.text:
Without a doubt one of the best known films that Elizabeth Hurley has starred in would be 1997's "Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery" starring opposite of Mike Myers. She would play the same role in the second film, 1999's "Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me". Another notable movie that she starred in would be "Bedazzled" with Brendan Fraser as the male lead.

What movies has Colin Farrel starred in?

Colin Farrel has starred in many different films. He starred in the remake of Total Recall, Horrible Bosses, Daredevil, Minority Report, and In Bruges. He also guest starred in an episode of Scrubs.

What films has Jon Foster starred in?

Jon Foster starred in eleven movies. The ones that he is most commonly known in are Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines, The Informers, Thirteen Days, and Stay Alive. He has also starred in The Door in the Floor, Tenderness, The Mysteries of Pittsburgh, The Last Rites of Ransome Pride, Pandorum, Brotherhood, and Rampart.
